claim: Helios is the son of Hera.

claim: Helios is the son of Hera.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Portrayed as majestic and solemn , often enthroned , and crowned with the polos  (  a high cylindrical crown worn by several of the Great Goddesses  )  , Hera may hold a pomegranate in her hand , emblem of fertile blood and death and a substitute for the narcotic capsule of the opium poppy .
